name: phenotypically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the physical characteristics of something living, especially those characteristics that can be seen: These cells are indistinguishable phenotypically and functionally from the others. The patient was phenotypically and developmentally normal.
More examplesFewer examplesThe mice were phenotypically indistinguishable from those in the control group.Phenotypically, the creature appears female, but it lacks female reproductive organs.These individuals are phenotypically normal except that they may be very tall and experience severe disorders of the skin.
